name: Distance Thrower
text: You are accurate with thrown weapons at longer ranges than normal.
benefit: With a thrown weapon, you reduce your penalty on ranged attack rolls due to range by 2.
staminaText: When making an attack with a thrown weapon, you can spend 2 stamina points to reduce your penalty on ranged attack rolls due to range by an additional 4.
mythicText: There’s virtually no limit to your powerful throwing arm.
mythicBenefit: Thrown weapons wielded by you have twice their normal range.
text_zh: 你能将投掷武器扔得更远。
benefit_zh: 当你使用投掷武器时，你超过射程的攻击检定罚值下降2点。
mythicText_zh: 对于你那强有力的手臂来说，投掷是没有极限的。
mythicBenefit_zh: 对于被你持用的投掷武器来说，它们的射程为正常的两倍。
staminaText_zh: 使用投掷武器时，如果花费2点耐力，可以将超过射程的攻击检定惩罚再减4点。
